Title: Waygate: Eon's Fringe
Description:
Far across the land in the mountainous regions of Thaldraszus sits a little inn nestled on the mountainside. Just inside the entryway sits a long-forgotten, dormant stone.

What say ye? Up fer another adventure, $n?
ObjectivesText: Locate the Dormant Waygate at Eon's Fringe in Thaldraszus.
CompletionText: Ye know I'd love tae sit around and talk, but there's work tae do.
RewardText:
Yer adventurous nature never ceases tae amaze!

I wonder how many more o' these things are out there.
